original_text: Because ye have thrust with side and with shoulder, and pushed all the diseased with your horns, till ye have scattered them abroad;
korean_text: 너희가 옆구리와 어깨로 밀어뜨리고 모든 병든 자를 뿔로 받아 무리를 밖으로 흩어지게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Because ye have thrust with side and with shoulder
and pushed all the diseased with your horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 뿔로 모든 병든 자들을 밀어내었으니

sentences.original_text: till ye have scattered them abroad
